item.title: Summary of refactoring a standalone application to Spring Cloud microservices
item.description: Spent a few days to transform the project from Spring Boot monolithic project into Spring Cloud microservices. To be honest, the current volume of business is far from microservices, standalone can completely hold. But can not help the leadership above the daily urging, forget it, let’s do it. The hardest part is not the technology The most time consuming part of switching from standalone to microservices is not in the technology upgrade.
